snippet: Facing the challenge of moving museum rooms as exactly as they stand.
abstract: Barnes Foundation, art museum located in Merion, Pa, is moving to a new building in downtown Philadelphia where, by court order, existing galleries will be replicated in the new location; Manhattan architects Tod Williams and Billie Tsien, who are designing the new building, find it a challenge to copy rooms almost exactly as they stand.
lead_paragraph: Facing the challenge of moving museum rooms as exactly as they stand.

headline.seo: For the New Barnes, Everything Old Is Old Again
headline.main: For the New Barnes, Everything Old Is Old Again
headline.print_headline: For the New Barnes, Everything Old Is Old Again
